Jonobie's and Jeff's Pictures Around Christmas, 2001

Johnnie seems pleased
Obie seems pleased, too
Jonobie working on the Baker's laptop setup at Boca Grande in the dining area

More pictures around Jonobie and Jeff's apartment- all Tiny Town figurines are pottery ones made by Jonobie
Jonobie has been doing a lot of pottery work of all kinds. These are all of Tiny Town- her pottery version of the petit-point figures made by her Mamma Slotterbeck and Aunt Catherine for the Baker Christmas trees.
Quite imaginative and interesting!
